tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "You may establish an Account only if: (i) you are a “natural person” and an adult in your country of residence (Corporations, Limited Liability Companies, partnerships and other legal or business entities may not establish an Account). and (ii) you are not an individual specifically prohibited by Blizzard from using the Platform."
tosdr.case: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
quoteText: (ii) you are not an individual specifically prohibited by Blizzard from using the Platform.
